docs.text:
Emplify User Guide


The following is a guide to Emplify.


What is Emplify


Emplify is an application that helps build better workplaces.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: The following is a guide to Emplify.
docs.title: Emplify User Guide

docs.text: Emplify is an application that helps build better workplaces.
docs.title: What is Emplify

docs.text: About page
docs.title: About

docs.text:
News




For details on how to post a news article visit the 
Posting News
 page.




News is where you can find out the latest from your employer. Article are displayed in reverse chronological order (most recent first).


The news landing page show a summary of the most recent articles, to read more just select any article.


Likes


Clicking like is a way to give positive feedback on a given article. you can see what other people are liking by visiting the 
Community
 section of the app.


Comments


You can comment on any article and you comment will be seen by all users beneath the corresponding article and on the  
Community page
docs.title: News

docs.text: For details on how to post a news article visit the  Posting News  page.   News is where you can find out the latest from your employer. Article are displayed in reverse chronological order (most recent first).  The news landing page show a summary of the most recent articles, to read more just select any article.
docs.title: News

docs.text: Clicking like is a way to give positive feedback on a given article. you can see what other people are liking by visiting the  Community  section of the app.
docs.title: Likes

docs.text: You can comment on any article and you comment will be seen by all users beneath the corresponding article and on the   Community page
docs.title: Comments

docs.text:
Community


As well as liking and commenting on news stories, you can post own news and pictures.


Posting to the community


To post something just click the plus in the top right of the page. You can add a picture to your post by clicking the camera icon (or clicking 'Choose file' if you're using the web app). Your posts can be any ength, but we'd recommend keeping your post to no longer than 50 words.


Deleting your post


If you make a mistake don't worry. You can delete you own posts by swiping left on your post (or clicking delete on the web app)


Feedback


Every so often
docs.title: Community

docs.text: Every so often
docs.title: Feedback

docs.text:
Feedback


Emplify allows users to provide instant feedback.


If you haven't Responded to the latest question you can cast your vote by selecting any of the options available. Once you've voted you will see the latest results. You can check back at any time to get an update until the next question is posted.
docs.title: Feedback

docs.text: Emplify allows users to provide instant feedback.  If you haven't Responded to the latest question you can cast your vote by selecting any of the options available. Once you've voted you will see the latest results. You can check back at any time to get an update until the next question is posted.
docs.title: Feedback

docs.text:
Groups


Groups are perhaps the most exciting feature of Emplify. Groups allow you to create micro-communities around departments, geography, events or some other common factor. It's kind of like WhatsApp, but for work.


Groups need to be created by Administrators, and you can only see Groups, once an administrator has added you, but once you're in you can share content that is only accessible by people in that group.
docs.title: Groups

docs.text: Groups are perhaps the most exciting feature of Emplify. Groups allow you to create micro-communities around departments, geography, events or some other common factor. It's kind of like WhatsApp, but for work.  Groups need to be created by Administrators, and you can only see Groups, once an administrator has added you, but once you're in you can share content that is only accessible by people in that group.
docs.title: Groups

docs.text:
Settings


Via the settings page you can update your password and update your profile picture.


Updating your profile picture




Click 'Update your porfile image'


If you're on a phone, select Camera to take a new photo or Photos to choose an existing image


If you're on a PC, select an image from your local machine
docs.title: Settings

docs.text: Via the settings page you can update your password and update your profile picture.
docs.title: Settings

docs.text: Click 'Update your porfile image'  If you're on a phone, select Camera to take a new photo or Photos to choose an existing image  If you're on a PC, select an image from your local machine
docs.title: Updating your profile picture

docs.text:
Troubleshooting


Help I can't register


If you're having trouble registering, please send an email to help@emplifyapp.com with your details and we'll try and get everything set up on your behalf.


Help I can't login


If you're having trouble logging in, try resetting your password. If that doesn't work email help@emplifyapp.com and we'll take a closer look.


I can't see groups that I'm sure I should have access to


Only administrators can add you to groups.


I've got an idea for a new Group


Please contact your Emplify co-ordinator.
docs.title: Troubleshooting

docs.text:
Getting Started


Administrators can login to Emplify at 
go.emplifyapp.com/admin/
. Once you're logged in you can carry out any of the following:




Create, edit, delete News post


View and delete users Community posts


View, edit and delete categories (used in News)


Post questions for feedback and view Results


Create groups


Create users and assigning groups
docs.title: Getting started

docs.text: Administrators can login to Emplify at  go.emplifyapp.com/admin/ . Once you're logged in you can carry out any of the following:   Create, edit, delete News post  View and delete users Community posts  View, edit and delete categories (used in News)  Post questions for feedback and view Results  Create groups  Create users and assigning groups
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text:
Posting News


To post a news article:




Click Posts


Click Create


Input the article details




The final two fields of the article allow you to post-date an article. This is helpful if you'd like your post to coincide with an event or news release.




Remember when you post a news article users will be sent a notification so please make sure you're entirely happy with your article before publishing.
docs.title: Posting News

docs.text: To post a news article:   Click Posts  Click Create  Input the article details   The final two fields of the article allow you to post-date an article. This is helpful if you'd like your post to coincide with an event or news release.   Remember when you post a news article users will be sent a notification so please make sure you're entirely happy with your article before publishing.
docs.title: Posting News

docs.text:
Asking Feedback


To create a new question:




Click Questions


Input the question and any supporting text


Input a publish date. It's important this is in the future to give you time to add options


Click Save


Select your Question then add your choices. The order you add choices is the order they will appear in the application so it's worth planning these before they are added.






Rembember users receive notifications so you should plan your questions and answers carefully
docs.title: Asking Questions
